Landskrona datum


The Bristles - harder and more pissed off than ever before

The Bristles new EP Val? - in English Election/Choice? - is released to the Swedish election, and the lyrics are completely in Swedish. The songs are HÃƒÂ¶gerns lakejer (Tory Lackeys), Val? (Election/Choice?), Antifascism ÃƒÂ¤r alltid sjÃƒÂ¤lvfÃƒÂ¶rsvar (Antifascism is Always Self Defence) and SvÃƒÂ¤rje skitland (Schwedung Land of Shit). The songs are recorded in one take, and no overdubs.

The band has no illusion about a labour government, but the last 8 years of Right wing rule has been a disaster. The Tories got re-elected at the same time as a fascist party got in the parliament.  

The recording and production is completely done by Tommy T and released on his Majken Records
